result.name: hca-land-assets-which-not-yet-being-marketed
result.notes: Details of HCA land not yet being marketed. HCA cannot make all its land available for sale immediately as it has to ensure that development can take place on it to meet Government objectives - so it has to invest in planning, infrastructure, deal with environmental issues etc. This can take years.

organization.name: homes-and-communities-agency
organization.title: Homes England
organization.description:
Homes England (formerly The Homes and Communities Agency) is the national housing and regeneration agency for England. It is the regulator of social housing providers and works with local partners to create new affordable homes and thriving neighbourhoods.

Homes England is an executive non-departmental public body, sponsored by the Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/homes-england

result.title: HCA land assets which not yet being marketed

extras.value: HCA publishes the list of all its sites (with basic details) on its website: http://www.homesandcommunities.co.uk/land-and-property-assets
